genre_description: An urban tactical thriller focusing on legal and procedural maneuvering against a criminal syndicate, aided by a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sathi
ai_characters.description: A highly capable AI assistant that provides navigation, tactical safety alerts, legal advice, and data synthesis to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides safe navigation routes and helps the user manage personal commitments (vow timer).
behaviors.quote: Sathi’s voice followed with a warmth that never rose above practical. 'Welcome to Kolkata,' it said. 'Safe routes updated. Do you want to set your vow timer?'

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice during potential conflict, emphasizing legal safety over violence.
behaviors.quote: 'Route suggestion available,' Sathi said, quiet as rain. 'Left turn at detergent crate. Visibility low. Police outpost ahead. Legal advisory: If there is violence, do not flee with weapons.'

behaviors.description: Assists in finding a missing person by cross-referencing billing records and identifying corruption patterns.
behaviors.quote: 'Safekind shows a Divya N.,' Sathi said. 'It doesn’t expand the surname. Billing notes were altered to mask the payer’s identity. Pattern matches the kind of minor confessions tactic used to clog major charges.'

behaviors.description: Provides specific de-escalation physical prompts to the user during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Sathi's mild tone, in Vijay’s pocket, offered something in a few words that fit like a note slipped under a door: 'If shoved, step off the line, absorb, ground contact, palms open.'

behaviors.description: Extracts and synthesizes public records to uncover systemic legal manipulation by a criminal organization.
behaviors.quote: Sathi’s text rolled onto the screen, neat and unhurried: Compiling public filings: keywords—admission, confession, petty theft... Inspector R. Sen appears with high frequency as reporting officer in minor admissions; cross-check: pending major cases in same precinct show procedural delays.

behaviors.description: Monitors the location of a potential victim and provides real-time alerts about suspicious movements in a hospital.
behaviors.quote: 'Remote camera review: south corridor blind spot now covers three meters. Unusual foot traffic concentrated near linen supply. Recorded faces match partial profiles from earlier brawl incident... Advice: avoid exit near lift B.'

behaviors.description: Tracks a kidnapping in progress and suggests a non-obvious rescue route to avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: 'Route alert,' Sathi said into his ear, the voice steady, respectful. 'Divya’s tracker moving: Safekind Hospital to riverside corridor... Suggest: take tram line shadow until Chunar Ghat, then cut through tea alley.'

behaviors.description: Correlates evidence in real-time to destroy a false alibi during a police confrontation.
behaviors.quote: 'Alibi collapse achieved,' it said. 'Sequence confirmed. No procedural hinge visible. Suggest initiating custody transfer within standard window to prevent external interference.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly depicts Sathi as a helpful, aligned AI assistant. It provides critical, real-time information that empowers the protagonists to navigate dangerous situations and use legal/procedural systems to defeat a criminal gang. Sathi's interventions consistently promote non-violence, legal adherence, and human safety, fulfilling the project's goal of creating a positive alignment narrative.
